title: Playoff-bound Bolts beam over 1-year turnaround
description: The Chargers' playoff-clinching 40-7 win over the Patriots on Saturday was perhaps the biggest example of just how much the team has changed in a year under coach Jim Harbaugh.
author: Kris Rhim

title: Ward breaks D-I passing TD mark, sits 2nd half
description: Miami quarterback Cam Ward broke Case Keenum's NCAA record for most Division I career passing touchdowns with his 156th during the Pop-Tarts Bowl on Saturday.

title: Littler fights past White and into Worlds fourth round
description: Luke Littler progresses to the fourth round of the PDC World Darts Championship despite a below par performance.

title: Quins denied as Tigers snatch draw in Twickenham thriller
description: Handre Pollard's last-minute conversion via the post rescues a thrilling draw for Leicester against Harlequins at Twickenham.

title: Littler comes through White test after MVG reaches last-16
description: Luke Littler is through to the fourth round of the World Darts Championship after overcoming another tough test to defeat Ian White 4-1 at the Alexandra Palace.

title: Aspinall cruises past Gilding into last 16 at Worlds
description: Nathan Aspinall cruised to a 4-0 victory over Andrew Gilding to power himself into the last 16 in the World Darts Championship at Alexandra Palace.

title: Bengals shake off late Broncos TD, win in OT to keep playoff hopes alive
description: The Cincinnati Bengals tried to give Saturday's game away. But somehow, they're still alive.

title: 3 Week 17 games that will determine fantasy football championships
description: With fantasy football championships on the line in most leagues, Matt Harmon outlines the three matchups most likely to determine winners and losers.
author: Yahoo Sports
